Text:
* 100% working (installed on WinXP Pro SP2)
* No bugs
* Minimum System Requirements - lol
Windows 95/98/XP/NT 4.0 SP3
Pentium 133 (166 recommended)
16MB RAM (32 recommended)
2MB video card (16-bit)

This game was released on 12/10/98. The games graphics seriously outdated but descent.
It's cool and fun to play If you like mini golf.

Thanx Mackez :)
